projectGridLines.stationName: Flipkart Internet Pvt Ltd - Site Reliability Engineering,Bengaluru
projectGridLines.title: Data Engineering Interns
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Data Engineering Interns

Description: Students will be working with the CPG BU under the Site Reliability Team

Skills Sets: Computer Science fundamentals - programming, distributed systems,

networks, databases, system internals

Expected Learning:

You will be the part of SRE team that trying to solve operational problems using

Software Engineering.

You will work closely with internal Flipkart Engineering Teams like Functional teams,

Platforms, Infrastructure etc. to identify, define, and track key reliability challenges and

work towards fixing them.

Build software and systems to manage platform infrastructure and applications in a

polyglot environment

Focus on 360Â° reliability posture to improve reliability, quality and performance of

Flipkart Systems

Bring a proactive approach to spotting problems, areas for improvement, and

performance bottlenecks.
